data.name: sysFromXpubOrAddress
data.description: The  [  _xPub_ ](types/#xpub)  or address to fetch UTXOs for

data.name: utxoObject
data.description: Back-end provider UTXO JSON object to be sanitized

data.name: utxos
data.description: Inputs/outputs of the transaction

data.name: txid
data.description: Transaction ID

data.name: vout
data.description: Output number

data.name: value
data.description: Value being transferred

data.name: height
data.description: Block height

data.name: confirmations
data.description: Number of confirmations

data.name: address
data.description: Address the funds are being/have been sent to

data.name: assetInfo
data.description: Information on an asset included in the UTXO

data.name: assetGuid
data.description: Unique, numeric identifier of the token generated on creation

data.name: value
data.description: Value transferred. Type will be  _BN_  if within a  [  _Res_ ](types/#res)  object,  _String_  if within a  [  _UTXO_ ](types/#utxo)  object

data.name: assets
data.description: Details of any assets involved in the transaction

data.name: assetGuid
data.description: Unique, numeric identifier of the token generated on creation

data.name: contract
data.description: ERC20 address of the contract connected to this SPT for use in the SysEthereum bridge

data.name: symbol
data.description: Token symbol (in base64)

data.name: pubData
data.description: Public data information of the token

data.name: desc
data.description: Base64 encoded string describing the token

data.name: totalSupply
data.description: Total current issued supply

data.name: maxSupply
data.description: Maximum supply in sats

data.name: decimals
data.description: Number of digits of precision for the token

data.name: updateCapabilityFlags
data.description: Update capabilities on this asset

data.name: addressOrXpub
data.description: An address or  [  _xPub_ ](types/#xpub)  to fetch UTXOs for

data.name: network
data.description: Defaults to Syscoin Mainnet. Network to be used to create address for notary and auxfee payout address if those features exist for the asset
` Hex`

data.name: txOpts
data.description: If this is passed in we use assetWhiteList field of options to skip over (if assetWhiteList is null) UTXOs if they use notarization for an asset that is not a part of assetMap

data.name: rbf
data.description: Replace-by-fee, enables a token to use the high-speed Z-DAG protocol. Should be false for SYS transactions

data.name: memo
data.description: Text message/Memo to be included with the transaction

data.name: memoHeader
data.description: Header of the memo

data.name: assetWhiteList
data.description: Allows UTXOs to be added from assets in the whitelist or the asset being sent

data.name: assetMap
data.description: Destination outputs for a transaction requiring UTXO sanitizing, used in assetWhiteList, check described above

data.name: changeAddress
data.description: The change address where the left over amount should be sent to

data.name: outputs
data.description: An array of outputs containing which address to send the asset to and the value to send

data.name: value
data.description: The amount of the asset to send

data.name: address
data.description: Address to send the asset to

data.name: excludeZeroConf
data.description: False by default. Filtering out 0 conf UTXO, new/update/send asset transactions must use confirmed inputs only as per Syscoin Core mempool policy
